EndpointRequest.description: Represents a request sent to an endpoint

EndpointResponse.description: Represents a response returned from an endpoint

DryRunResult.description: Represents the outcome of a dry-run operation

ErrorResult.description: Represents an error outcome from an operation

Package.description: Represents a package in the model

Serializer.description: Handles serialization and deserialization of data

Connector.description: Represents a concrete implementation of a connector

Parameter.description: Defines a parameter for connector operations

Result.description: Represents a generic result from an operation

Factory.description: Provides factory methods for creating instances

Metric.description: Represents a metric used for measurement or monitoring

Type.description: Defines a data type or schema element

Helper.description: Provides utility methods and helper functions
